html: Who will contend with me— The Bodleian MS. and another add the word הוא hu ; יריב הוא מי mi hu yarib , as in the like phrase in the next verse; and in the very same phraseJob 13:19 , and so likewise in many other places,Job 17:3; Job 41:1 . Sometimes on the like occasions it is זה מי mi zeh , and זה הוא מי mi hu zeh , "Who is this one?" The word has probably been lost out of the present text; and the reading of the MSS. above mentioned seems to be genuine.
